channel.title: docker_command on Hye's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in docker_command on Hye's Blog

item.title: Docker_command
item.description: docker ps -a (실행중인 docker container 프로세스 목록) logs -f container이름 (로그 - ps -a명령어를 통해 container이름 알 수 있음) stop containerID exec -it containerID /bin/bash (Docker container 진입) docker-compose up -d ( compose 실행 ) down –volumes ( compose 삭제 )
